channel.title: What base to use?
channel.description:
Hello everyone.
As you can see by the title i want to find a "Good" base to start with. Idk if i want a clean source with no content or one with alot of content.
I dont know if i would be possible to make a decent server from a clean source, im not the best at coding. And if i chose one with alot of content, it's just a leech.
Can anyone help me out with this? I dont know what to do...

item.title: What base to use?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Runeflection, post:19, topic:465574”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=571057.msg4135408#msg4135408 date=1351643505]
RuneSource is what I regret not using when I started. Still, RuneSource wasn’t even out when I started.
[/quote]
You was like 6 when you started? That’s barely in school.[/quote]
I was 9. Was RuneSource out then, idk.

Read full topic

item.title: What base to use?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

arham 4:

RuneSource is what I regret not using when I started.

this…

Runeflection:

winterlove is the foundation of private servers and should be regarded highly above pi, even if it is unstable.

winterlove should be an example of what not to do. It was never meant to be the foundation for anything! It was just to see if it could be done.

Read full topic

item.title: What base to use?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Mario PvP, post:13, topic:465574”][quote author=k1ng0frs link=topic=571057.msg4135173#msg4135173 date=1351626326]

If you aren’t a good programmer, I’d say Delta but that’s a shitty source, unstable, but you can learn very much from it.
Packaging, cleaning, basics, correct Java

Have you used Delta? It has no Packaging
[/quote]You can package it. Yes I’ve used Delta, you can learn how to package your source. You should use RuneSource, Hyperion or Apollo.
3 great sources.[/quote]

implying runesource is packaged, it isn’t.

@OP, use whatever you feel comfortable using.

Read full topic

item.title: What base to use?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

If you want to go the smart way try runesource, apollo, or hyperion. Otherwise try project insanity and see what you can do.

Read full topic

item.title: What base to use?
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

[quote=“k1ng0frs, post:3, topic:465574”][quote author=Mario PvP link=topic=571057.msg4135163#msg4135163 date=1351625566]
If you aren’t a good programmer, I’d say Delta but that’s a shitty source, unstable, but you can learn very much from it.
Packaging, cleaning, basics, correct Java
[/quote]
Have you used Delta? It has no Packaging[/quote]You can package it. Yes I’ve used Delta, you can learn how to package your source. You should use RuneSource, Hyperion or Apollo.
3 great sources.

Read full topic

item.title: What base to use?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:9, topic:465574”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=571057.msg4135215#msg4135215 date=1351630367]

If you aren’t a good programmer, I’d say Delta but that’s a shitty source, unstable, but you can learn very much from it.
Packaging, cleaning, basics, correct Java

Have you used Delta? It has no Packaging

Packaged versions do.

OH SNAP

OT: use Apollo, it’s so good people just dont realize it because thier so lost in PIs shitty code.

Tell me more about you using apollo,
oh you don’t
[/quote]

Tell me about the time you shut the fuck up,
oh it didnt happen[/quote]
better comeback is appreciated

Read full topic
